verses.verse: וְיָצָ֥א <WH3318> ve-ya-Tza And there shall come forth חֹ֖טֶר <WH2415> Cho-ter a rod מִגֵּ֣זַע <WH1503> mig-Ge-za' out of the stem יִשָׁ֑י <WH3448> yi-Shai; of Jesse וְנֵ֖צֶר <WH5342> ve-Ne-tzer and a Branch מִשָּׁרָשָׁ֥יו <WH8328> mish-sha-ra-Shav out of his roots יִפְרֶֽה׃ <WH6509> yif-Reh. shall grow
